popular.Title: Creator
popular.Plot: As a future war between the human race and artificial intelligence rages on,ex- special forces agent Joshua is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI.

popular.Title: I Am Legend
popular.Plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

popular.Title: The Avengers
popular.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

popular.Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
popular.Plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

popular.Title: Interstellar
popular.Plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

popular.Title: Game of Thrones
popular.Plot: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.

popular.Title: Vikings
popular.Plot: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.

popular.Title: Gotham
popular.Plot: The story behind Detective James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival.

popular.Title: Power
popular.Plot: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

popular.Title: Narcos
popular.Plot: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

popular.Title: Breaking Bad
popular.Plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's financial future.

popular.Title: Doctor Strange
popular.Plot: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

popular.Title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
popular.Plot: The Rebellion makes a risky move to steal the plans to the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

popular.Title: Assassin's Creed
popular.Plot: When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society.

popular.Title: Luke Cage
popular.Plot: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.

popular.Title: The Godfather
popular.Plot: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son, Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

horror.Title: Creature
horror.Plot: Ahana is the owner of a new hotel in the hills. She meets Kunal at the launch party and they fall in love but they are soon terrorised by a dinosaur-like creature that begins to kill the residents.

horror.Title: Darr @ the Mall
horror.Plot: A newly constructed mall is suspected to be haunted when a few workers are mysteriously killed during its construction. Vishnu, a security guard, unveils the mystery behind the mall's dark secret.

horror.Title: The House Next Door
horror.Plot: Living a peaceful life in the mountains, Krishnakanth and Lakshmi welcome their new neighbours, the D'Costas. When their eldest daughter, Jenny, invites unwanted elements in the house, terror ensues.

horror.Title: Annabelle
horror.Plot: John and Mia Form are attacked by members of a satanic cult that uses their old doll as a conduit to make their life miserable. This unleashes a string of paranormal events in the Forms' residence.

horror.Title: The Witch
horror.Plot: In the New England of the 17th century, a banished Puritan family sets up a farm by the edge of a huge remote forest where no other family lives. Soon, sinister forces then start haunting them.

horror.Title: Dead Silence
horror.Plot: After the delivery of a mysterious package, Jamie's wife is found murdered. When he digs deeper, he realises that her death might have a connection with a deceased ventriloquist and her dummy.

horror.Title: The Conjuring
horror.Plot: Rod and Carolyn find their pet dog dead under mysterious circumstances and experience a spirit that harms their daughter Andrea. They finally call investigators who can help them get out of the mess.

horror.Title: Alien
horror.Plot: The crew of a spacecraft, Nostromo, intercept a distress signal from a planet and set out to investigate it. However, to their horror, they are attacked by an alien which later invades their ship.

horror.Title: The Nun
horror.Plot: A priest and a novice arrive in Romania to investigate the death of a young nun. However, things take an ugly turn after they encounter a supernatural force.

horror.Title: Annabelle Comes Home
horror.Plot: Judy and her babysitter are left alone in her house after her parents leave to investigate a case. However, an unexpected guest sets Annabelle free, unleashing demonic activity in the house.

horror.Title: The Wailing
horror.Plot: When an outsider visits a village, its inhabitants experience a mysterious epidemic. A police officer then tries to solve the mystery behind the outbreak to save his sick daughter.

horror.Title: Evil Dead
horror.Plot: Five friends decide to spend a weekend in a remote cabin located deep in the forest. When they discover an unknown book there, they are forced to deal with the demons living in the nearby woods.

thriller.Title: The Dark Knight
thriller.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

thriller.Title: 12 Angry Men
thriller.Plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

thriller.Title: Schindler's List
thriller.Plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

thriller.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
thriller.Plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

thriller.Title: Pulp Fiction
thriller.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

thriller.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
thriller.Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

thriller.Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
thriller.Plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

thriller.Title: Forrest Gump
thriller.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweeth

thriller.Title: Fight Club
thriller.Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

thriller.Title: Inception
thriller.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

thriller.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
thriller.Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

thriller.Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
thriller.Plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

thriller.Title: The Matrix
thriller.Plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

thriller.Title: Goodfellas
thriller.Plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
